apis.description: Create a new enrollment term for the specified account.

operations.notes: Create a new enrollment term for the specified account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: enrollment_term[name]
parameters.description: The name of the term.

parameters.name: enrollment_term[start_at]
parameters.description:
The day/time the term starts.
Accepts times in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2015-01-10T18:48:00Z.

parameters.name: enrollment_term[end_at]
parameters.description:
The day/time the term ends.
Accepts times in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2015-01-10T18:48:00Z.

parameters.name: enrollment_term[sis_term_id]
parameters.description: The unique SIS identifier for the term.

parameters.name: enrollment_term[overrides][enrollment_type][start_at]
parameters.description:
The day/time the term starts, overridden for the given enrollment type.
*enrollment_type* can be one of StudentEnrollment, TeacherEnrollment, TaEnrollment, or DesignerEnrollment

parameters.name: enrollment_term[overrides][enrollment_type][end_at]
parameters.description:
The day/time the term ends, overridden for the given enrollment type.
*enrollment_type* can be one of StudentEnrollment, TeacherEnrollment, TaEnrollment, or DesignerEnrollment

apis.description: A paginated list of all of the terms in the account.

operations.notes: A paginated list of all of the terms in the account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: workflow_state
parameters.description:
If set, only returns terms that are in the given state.
Defaults to 'active'.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Array of additional information to include.

"overrides":: term start/end dates overridden for different enrollment types

id.description: The unique identifier for the enrollment term.

sis_term_id.description: The SIS id of the term. Only included if the user has permission to view SIS information.

sis_import_id.description: the unique identifier for the SIS import. This field is only included if the user has permission to manage SIS information.

start_at.description: The datetime of the start of the term.

end_at.description: The datetime of the end of the term.

workflow_state.description: The state of the term. Can be 'active' or 'deleted'.

overrides.description: Term date overrides for specific enrollment types
